tool_description: Discover the Strain Info API â€“ your gateway to comprehensive cannabis strain data. Access strain names, types (indica, sativa, hybrid), ratings, effects, flavors, and descriptions with ease. Build cannabis-related apps, conduct strain research, or satisfy your curiosity with accurate and up-to-date information. Enhance your projects by leveraging our API for streamlined cannabis insights. Explore the diverse world of cannabis strains today!
title: The Cannabis API

api_list.name: Get All Effects
api_list.description: Get Every Cannabis Effect in the dataset.

api_list.name: Get All Flavours
api_list.description: Get Every Cannabis Flavour in the dataset.

api_list.name: Get Strain Flavours By ID
api_list.description: Returns the flavours of the strain with the specified ID.

api_list.name: Get Strain Effects By ID
api_list.description: Returns the effects of the strain with the specified ID.

api_list.name: Get Strain By Flavours
api_list.description: Returns the id, name, type, rating, effects, flavours and description of all the strains with the specified flavours.

api_list.name: Get Strain By Effects
api_list.description: Returns the id, name, type, rating, effects, flavours and description of all the strains with the specified effects.

api_list.name: Get Strain By Type
api_list.description: Returns the id, name, type, rating, effects, flavours and description of all the strains with the specified type (sativa, indica or hybrid).

api_list.name: Get Strain By Name
api_list.description: Returns the id, name, type, rating, flavours, effects and description of a strain by it's name.
